page.title: 13SCHOOLING IN MURTON CONT.
page.content:
{MURTON JUBILEE JUNIOR MIXED AND {INFANTS SCHOOL. Was built in 1977 and has a roll of 215 children,mostly from the west of the village. {MURTON ST. JOSEPHS R.C. JUNIOR MIXED {AND INFANTS SCHOOL. Was built in 1895 and caters for the children of catholic families of the village at present there are 80 children on roll.
For the past few years the birth rate has been falling and this is reflected in the number of children at school. This village is well endowed with school places should the population ever increase.
